thread.title: BRIEF-Facephi Biometria H1 net loss widens to 407,792 euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Facephi Biometria H1 net loss widens to 407,792 euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Facephi Biometria H1 net loss widens to 407,792 euros
text:
Sept 29 Facephi Biometria SA :
* Reports H1 net sales 135,458 euros ($152,570) compread to no sales year-on-year
* H1 net loss is 407,792 euros versus loss of 319,470 euros year-on-year
Source text: bit.ly/1LMKZe2
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8879 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
